interests.title: Research Interests
interests.text: Exploring frontier applications of multimodal AI: emotion recognition from speech and text, reinforcement learning for decision-making, and intelligent financial data analysis. My work focuses on bridging human emotion, language, and economic behavior understanding.

about.title: About
about.text: I am a Master’s student in Machine Learning at Université de Montréal / Mila, with a background in computer science ,full‑stack development and project management. Research interests: natural language processing,multimodal emotion recognition, reinforcement learning, and financial AI.
